div.class: inner col col24 first last id664c765c-0938-42bd-990c-3ed20079eab8
inner col col24 first last ida14c7807-c099-40ce-8231-564764ee28e3

div.h2:
Beginning Monday, March 23, 2020, ThroUgh April 30, 2020,
CITY-Parish offices WILL BE CLOSED TO VISITORS.
div.p: Due to the changing circumstances surrounding COVID-19 (Coronavirus), customer services will be provided via phone. Please contact the appropriate office at the telephone number listed below.
